original: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
analyzed: tena samayena buddhaḥ bhagavā sāvatthiyam viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme

original: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū jānaṁ sappāṇakaṁ udakaṁ paribhuñjanti.
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyāḥ bhikkhū jānam sappāṇakam udakam paribhuñjanti

original: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā …pe… te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
analyzed: ye te bhikkhū appicchā pe te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti

original: “kathañhi nāma chabbaggiyā bhikkhū jānaṁ sappāṇakaṁ udakaṁ paribhuñjissantī”ti …pe…
analyzed: katham hi nāma chabbaggiyāḥ bhikkhū jānam sappāṇakam udakam paribhuñjissanti iti pe

original: “saccaṁ kira tumhe, bhikkhave, jānaṁ sappāṇakaṁ udakaṁ paribhuñjathā”ti?
analyzed: saccam kira tumhe bhikkhave jānam sappāṇakam udakam paribhuñjatha ati

original: kathañhi nāma tumhe, moghapurisā, jānaṁ sappāṇakaṁ udakaṁ paribhuñjissatha.
analyzed: katham hi nāma tumhe mogha purisāḥ jānam sappāṇakam udakam paribhuñjissatha
neta moghapurisāḥ appasannānam vā pasādāya pe

original: evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddiseyyātha—
analyzed: evam ca pana bhikkhave imam sikkhāpadam uddiseyyātha

original: “Yo pana bhikkhu jānaṁ sappāṇakaṁ udakaṁ paribhuñjeyya, pācittiyan”ti.
analyzed: yaḥ pana bhikkhu jānam sappāṇakam udakam paribhuñjeyya pācittiyanti
pe ayam imasmin atthe adhippetaḥ bhikkhu iti

original: sāmaṁ vā jānāti, aññe vā tassa ārocenti.
analyzed: sāmam vā jānāti aññe vā tassa ārocenti

original: “Sappāṇakan”ti jānanto, “paribhogena marissantī”ti jānanto paribhuñjati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
analyzed: sappāṇakanti jānantaḥ paribhogena marissanti iti jānantaḥ paribhuñjati āpatti pācittiyassa
sappāṇake sappāṇaka saññī paribhuñjati āpatti pācittiyassa
paribhogena na marissanti iti jānantaḥ paribhuñjati
